700221f-a.title: Bronx: 175th Street (East) - Topping Avenue
700221f-a.text:
East 175th Street, south side, west from Topping to Monroe Aves..
showing a four-unit 6-story apartment house, occupying the entire block.
About 1929.
General Photographic Company.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
